text: A coach is a carriage pulled by two or more horses as a team. It is driven by a coachman and/or one or more postilions. The carriage is usually closed (with a roof) and has four wheels. == Other websites == *Belgian coach museum in Bree *Coach - LoveToKnow 1911. 1911 Edition of the Encyclop√¶dia Britannica. *Coaches 1750 to 1900. History Learning Site. *Coaching History by Anne Woodley Category:Animal-powered vehicles
title: Coach (carriage)
